name: RealmDash
description:
Team: CoffeeCats

Game Description: Realm Dash is an endless running game where the player plays as a Wolf dashing after its prey. 
While running, he finds that there is a parallel realm, a spirit world, where he can gain energy to run in the real world.
He finds that running also reduces his energy in the spirit world which he can gain only in the real world.
In order to keep running and ultimately catching his prey, he has to maintain energy in both the worlds.
For this, he has to go to both the worlds and collect energy for his survival. The game ends when either of his energies depletes.

Platform: PC

Team Members : Sandeep Kumar Pilakhnawal, Vikas Sharma,  Aditya Muley
